title: plat 2 Making team!! for ranked 5's
body:
Ok! well first off i want to get a group of 5+ players plat+ with quite an amount of time up there sleeve to climb the ranked 5's ladder.

im not looking for players who want to play tournaments because i cant make a lot of them but if were all available and want to thats fine :)

add me in game or post here idm ign: eVo Rampage   and also will be using teamspeak  and u need a working microphone

replies.body: Plat 5 supp main. Season 4 plat 3 with low diamond elo. Can play mid and adc also.

Diamond 5 ADC here if youre still looking for one!
IGN: Wyndhem

Jungle/Support Main, Currently Gold V after failed placement series, Season 4 i was Plat 2,
Currenlty climbing back up to Plat.

Gold V just finished placements dnt play solo que much but play alot of team ranks 
IGN -  Wolves or NightTemplar 
Would be keen to play any role if your up for it

Hi, would be willing to Top if that's not taken. 
- Plat 4 currently.

Also have a Plat 1 friend who mains jungle who would be willing to join us if you want.
yeah sweet as i accepted your add
i can supp if you can find one, only s3 at the moment but have pretty decent knowledge of the game
